title: Chelsea Clinton passes on running for Congress in 2026
shortDescription: Former first kid Chelsea Clinton is passing on a run to replace retiring New York Rep. Jerry Nadler as Kennedy heir Jack Schlossberg considers a run.

title: Trump demands 'proof' vaccines work amid CDC turmoil
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is questioning COVID-19 vaccines and demanding drug companies prove they work, amid changes at the CDC.

title: Trump says he may send National Guard to New Orleans over Chicago
shortDescription: President Trump suggested he may not send National Guard troops into Chicago and could instead target New Orleans in Republican-led Louisiana.

title: Trump blasts Xi, Putin and Kim’s parade alliance
shortDescription: President Donald Trump criticizes China, Russia, and North Korea leaders' joint appearance at China’s military parade, calling it a conspiracy.

title: Eric Trump takes on sumo wrestler
shortDescription: Eric Trump tried his hand at sumo wrestling while on a trip to Japan. He joked that he will stick to real estate.

title: Trump to move Space Command HQ to Huntsville, Alabama. Here's why
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is moving US Space Command headquarters from Colorado to Huntsville, Alabama, or “Rocket City.” Here's why.

title: Jeffrey Epstein victims to speak at Capitol press conference: Watch
shortDescription: Bipartisan House members to host a press conference featuring 10 victims of convicted sex offender Jeffery Epstein. Watch it here live.

title: Russia suggests Trump was being 'ironic' with 'conspiring' claim
shortDescription: China's Xi Jinping, Russia's Vladimir Putin and North Korea's Kim Jong Un met publicly for the first time. Trump said it looked liked conspiring.

title: Trump says the Smithsonian is too woke. We visited to find out
shortDescription: On Aug. 12, the Trump administration announced a review of the Smithsonian, starting with eight of its most-visited and high-profile museums.

title: Appeals court blocks Trump from using Alien Enemies Act to deport Venezuelans
shortDescription: A three-judge panel blocked the Trump administration from removing a group of Venezuelans under the seldom-used 18th-century law.

title: Trump says that Putin, Xi Jinping are conspiring in China against US
shortDescription: The president's comments about the three leaders come as they meet for the first time in Beijing.

title: Trump addresses online health concerns
shortDescription: "I was very active over the weekend." President Donald Trump addresses online concerns over his health during a Oval Office press conference.

title: Epstein files released by Congress
shortDescription: House Oversight released 33,000 Epstein files, but Democrats say the Department of Justice is withholding key documents.

title: Trump moves Space Command to Alabama
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced the U.S. Space Command headquarters will relocate to Huntsville, Alabama.

title: Chicago leaders slam Trump's planned National Guard deployment
shortDescription: Gov. JB Pritzker warned Chicagoans to expect aggressive immigration raids and other troops in fatigues in the city.

title: Trump threatens National Guard for Chicago
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he plans to send the National Guard to Chicago after a violent holiday weekend, though Gov. JB Pritzker opposes the move.

title: President Trump announces Space Command will move to Huntsville, Alabama
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says that the Colorado Springs based Space Command will be moving to Huntsville, Alabama, "correcting" a Biden Administration decision to keep it in Colorado Springs.

title: Trump says he was 'very active' despite public absence
shortDescription: President Donald Trump addressed online speculation about his health after a lapse in public appearances. 'I was very active over the weekend.'
